title: 95/549/EC: Commission Decision of 8 December 1995 amending Decision 93/495/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Canada (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 December 1995 amending Decision 93/495/EEC laying down specific  conditions for importing fishery products from Canada (Text with EEA relevance) (95/549/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 93/495/EEC is replaced by the Annex of this  Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
ANNEX
